ch.nolix.common.endPoint

Class HTTPEndPointListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Abortable, java.lang.Runnable

    public final class HTTPEndPointListener
extends EndPointListener
    A HTTP alpha end point listener listens to alpha end points on the HTTP port.

        public HTTPEndPointListener(IEndPointTaker endPointTaker)
        Creates new HTTP end point listener with the given end point taker. The new HTTP end point listener will start automatically.
        Parameters:
        endPointTaker -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the given end point taker is null.
